entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
